roleset.name: eat brunch
roleset.note: BRUNCH-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from brunch.01-v)

example.name: Let's do brunch
example.text: On Sunday the ladies brunched at Pallavicini Palace, guests of the Austrian president's daughter.
example.arg: guests of the Austrian president's daughter

example.name: Evidently only important people "brunch"
example.text: Together with a half-dozen influential senators and the Speaker of the House, they brunched on fresh Alaskan shrimp and crab.
example.arg: Together with a half-dozen influential senators and the Speaker of the House
on fresh Alaskan shrimp and crab
